column3: I am aware of and understand my obligations in respect of reproduction of currency notes.

I am aware of the provisions of the Monetary Law Act and the Penal Code with regard to offence of counterfeiting 
notes (Annex b).

The information I have provided are true and accurate and to the best of my knowledge the proposed 
reproduction is in compliance with the guidelines issued by CBSL.

I am aware that CBSL has the sole discretion to approve or decline permission to reproduce currency and 
compliance with the guidelines is not a guarantee that permission will be granted.

I am aware that CBSL may at any time without prior notice, amend and revoke an earlier approval and amend the 
Guidelines.
